content: Move queueChannelVideosInternal and processQueuedVideo methods from DownloadsController to QueueController
Update QueueController base route from 'download/queue' to 'queue'
Move queueChannelSlack method from ChannelsController to QueueController
Update all queue route tags for consistency
Update QUEUE_URLS constants and internal references to new paths
Run tsoa to regenerate routes.ts and swagger.json
Test that all routes work correctly after changes
